alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Madison, southeastern Moore, southeastern Lincoln and west central Franklin Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hazel Green, or 8 miles north of Meridianville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Huntland, Tims Ford Lake, Lincoln, Elora and Hurdlow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
